programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Caspian: The Hidden Cradle
programme.desc: At the the heart of one of the most ancient parts of the civilized world, the Caspian sea is the largest land locked body of water on earth. This terrain is home to some of the most unique, mysterious and prehistoric creatures on earth.

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Arabia: Land of Illusions
programme.desc: The Arabian peninsula is an ancient land of illusion. Extreme heat seems to sap life out of every corner. Yet, tricks of the light and the art of deception make survival possible. Nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Malaysia: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: Malaysia is one of a handful of countries in the world described as mega-diverse. Malaysia's animals and plants have exploited every opportunity to carve out an existence and so have adapted to some very strange ways of life.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Thailand: The Wild Heart
programme.desc: Thailand is a land of extremes. A country shaped by wild forces, where animals face tough challenges to survive. Tropical rainforests, primeval caves, mangrove swamps, and rocky shorelines provide homes for remarkable creatures.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Cambodia: The Water Kingdom
programme.desc: Cambodia's wildlife and climate is ruled by the monsoon cycle. It is a wild land of extreme rains, raging rivers and flooding lakes that create great challenges for its animals, and a fine balance between seasons.

programme.title: Management: Management (2009)
programme.desc: Jennifer Aniston and Steve Zahn star in this smart romantic comedy about a motel night manager who won't take no for an answer when he falls for an uptight sales rep.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: Legendary

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Web of Deceit, Part 2
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and his robed rival rages on, Yusei must rely on his deck if he plans to survive this Shadow Duel and uncover the truth behind the Dark Signers sinister scheme to destroy the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Good Cop, Bad Cop
programme.desc: After agreeing to help Yusei meet with Director Goodwin, Officer Trudge unknowingly becomes one of the Dark Signers' drones and challenges a wounded Jack Atlas to a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Fight or Flight

programme.desc: After returning to the Satellite Sector, Yusei meets up with his old friend Crow and soon finds himself in a tag team Turbo Duel with Sector Security.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka wins a prize from a radio DJ, learns the truth about Seefra and locates the Meethus Diagram.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A scientist from the original Commonwealth shows up, caught in a time loop.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Flavin returns, sparking a gang war, and helps Dylan develop as a Paradine.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A crystal that can restore the Andromeda's power is discovered, but in order to get it, Dylan must work for the mine's owner.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tunnels are discovered on Seefra which can be used to reach eight other Seefra planets.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years hed worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Girl in The Ditch
programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of Sensing Murder psychics are challenged to unmask the killer or killers of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydneys downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.desc: We delve into the twisted mind of one of Australia's most prolific serial murderers. John Wayne Glover - The Granny Killer, was truly an evil man.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Better the Devil You Know
programme.desc: Alex and Claire's secret brings one family together and brings another to the brink.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Road Home
programme.desc: After months of searching, Becky finally finds out what happened to Brick. She and Jodi discover the horrible truth after Becky is led to Brick by a dream.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: An Affair to Forget
programme.desc: It seems Sally is taking advantage of Nick's absence in town by inviting a stranger over to Wilgul. Claire warns Tess against putting her nose in, but she just can't resist.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Put to the Test
programme.desc: A careless prank on the groom threatens to put a stop to the impending nuptials of Jodi and Alberto. Meanwhile, Claire's expanding waistline is causing her all kinds of problems!

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Wedding
programme.desc: The Wedding Day is here and nearly everything that can go wrong does go wrong. But for one couple, it will be a day to remember for all the right reasons!

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Gone to the Dogs
programme.desc: When Becky and Jake are forced to steal a horse, they find new depths to their relationship and Alex is dismayed when Claire starts buying up old nags from the sale yards.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. Shes a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her Frugal Flynn because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canadas largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdys dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canadas booming energy and mining industries. It doesnt take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the worlds largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roller Ghoster
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS heads to Ohio to investigate Kings Island, anamusement park that sits on land that was thesite of an awful accident.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Spirits of the Night
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS visits the home of the Scully family, who are so terrified they are ready to pack up and move.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Pearl Harbor Phantoms
programme.desc: For the first time ever, TAPS travels to Hawaii to explore one of America's most sacred settings, Pearl Harbor. They are joined in their investigation of the Pacific Aviation Museum by Destination Truth's Josh Gates.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Scream Park
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Sylvan Beach, New York where the new owner of a historic amusement park finds himself in the middle of a mystery.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roasts and Ghosts
programme.desc: The TAPS team is the first paranormal team to ever investigate the famed Friar's Club in New York City. Next, the team travels to the Main Street Armory in Rochester, New York.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Crime Don't Pay
programme.desc: Today the crew is hunting for Holly, a car thief. She's one of Tim's bonds and the entire Dog crew knows that means trouble - or at least a long and difficult chase.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Twisted Love
programme.desc: Dog is tracking down Cecilia, who's wanted for car theft, but she's nowhere to be found. Her girlfriend and co-signer has gone missing too. Just when the trail goes cold, a friend leads the team to the cosigner's empty apartment.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Day of the Dog
programme.desc: Dog and the team are back in Colorado hunting bounties. Today's fugitive has a long rap sheet and a reputation for packing heat. With nothing but an address and phone number, the team heads out on the hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sleep Cover
programme.desc: With Korie still in Africa, Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bella's sleepover. When a couple boys play a prank on the girls, Willie and Jep prove to be the perfect chaperones for the task.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rings in the New Year with three back-to-back missions.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: White water rescue rookies in Nelson BC get a taste of reality when their swift-water training course becomes an actual mission, one they will never forget.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams go deep for a missing subject in the Upana cave system on Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In southeastern British Columbia, Nelson Search and Rescue is rescuing an overly curious canine whos tumbled off a cliff.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent-Harrison Search and Rescue deal with darkness and death on a late night callout.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Parks Canada Search and Rescue deal with injured hikers and bad news bears.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Southeastern British Columbia, Columbia Valley Search and Rescue scour the rugged backcountry for a missing field researcher.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: On Vancouver Islands challenging 75 kilometre West Coast hiking Trail, heavy fog hinders Parks Canada rescue efforts.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A late night mission turns strange for Penticton and Nelson Search and Rescue when the surviving witness is cuffed on an outstanding arrest warrant.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In British Columbias Fraser Valley, Kent Harrison Search and Rescue respond to a late night SOS for missing hikers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.desc: Kelley feels Keionte's childish behavior has her considering burning their marriage license. He claims that once they married, Mommie Dearest was born and no longer wants to be her business partner! Can they figure it out before it's too late?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sick and Tired
programme.desc: Timothy is tired of being kicked out the house every time Erin catches an attitude. If she kicks him out once more, he's gone for good. Erin says she dropped out of college and left behind a full tennis scholarship because of him.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and cant keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Yoga-to Be Kidding Me
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a nice part of town to repossess a BMW from an entitled yuppie, but first they'll have to contend with his rampaging long-distance girlfriend. Then, Lou, Lyndah, and Matt venture into a trailer park.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Angry Swarms
programme.desc: Matt, Lou, and Lyndah try to repo a car from a man who is not afraid to throw some punches. Then, Matt and Lou face a dilemma when they realize their target vehicle is filled with angry bees. And, Sonia and Froy hit the airwaves to reclaim a truck.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doggin' and Draggin'
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Off the Hitch
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy get the worst service ever from a street-side coffee vendor who won't give up his truck. Then, Froy and Lyndah confront a failed actor who has abandoned his dream and his responsibility for his car payments. Finally, it's death...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smoke, Lead, and Alcohol
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy venture into one of the city's most dangerous neighborhoods, only to find a debtor ready to defend his ride by pumping it full of lead, with no concern for who gets caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Kart Them Away
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy repossess a car from a cheating husband who's shacked up at a nearby motel. His wife probably isn't going to be too happy to hear about this. Then, Sonia and Lyndah crash a high school reunion to confront an over-the-hill jock.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Judge Knot
programme.desc: Lindor gets some unexpected help fighting his court case. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Pastor Disaster
programme.desc: When Cora announces that the church board is seeking a new pastor, which comes with an impressive salary, Brown decides to throw his hat into the pulpit. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Mr. Fix It
programme.desc: Mr. Brown gets Philip to fix his broken things, but soon starts to take advantage. (S3, ep4)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Testing 1, 2, 3
programme.desc: The Pleasant Days crew has their work cut out for them when they help Phillip prep for the S.A.T. (S3, ep5)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Efe The Great
programme.desc: When Efe becomes an accidental hero the Assisted Living crew uses his fame for their own gain. (S3, ep6)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: I Will Dye For You
programme.desc: After Jeremy gets a gray hair, he sets out to prove he's not getting old. Mr. Brown has to speak at a funeral. (S3, ep7)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Ear Hustle And Flow
programme.desc: When Vinny gets his hearing aid fixed, he overhears a conversation that gets him into trouble. (S3, ep8)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Wobble Wobble
programme.desc: The Pleasant Days crew confronts Vinny over his reckless lifestyle. (S3, ep9)

programme.title: Run's House: Series Premiere
programme.desc: Daughter Angela is graduating from high school, and Run plans to reward her for being a straight-A student and the family's "role model" by throwing her a party.

programme.title: Run's House: The Birds and the Bees
programme.desc: Run invites an emerging hip-hop band, Union Turnpike, to the house to strategize their pitch to Russell Simmons' new music label.

programme.title: Run's House: Chicks Fly the Coop
programme.desc: Run's blood boils upon finding that his backyard pool house has become filled with family junk. He vows to clean it out, which unleashes conflict with every family member who wants to hang onto some possession.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Suicide Possession
programme.desc: Joan and her boyfriend Tony are seeing apparitions in their New Jersey home. Both are concerned that the spirits are influencing their behavior: a non-drinker, Tony has turned to the bottle while Joan has thoughts of harming herself.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Birmingham Central
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to a disused prison in Birmingham which has housed some of the most notorious criminals in British history.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Codnor Castle Part 1
programme.desc: The team venture into a cottage where it is said no living soul can endure living there. With cursed dolls, murder and suicide this derelict place has everything to fear.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Codnor Castle Part 2
programme.desc: We stay with the team and find out what happened after we left them last time. The foreboding Codnor Castle Cottage maintains its attack on the Most Haunted team with dramatic effect causing Yvette calls an early end to their night in Hell House.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Dudley Castle
programme.desc: The ruins that make up Dudley Castle house a plethora of paranormal activity for Yvette and her team to investigate. Strange noises and a violent poltergeist await them as they turn the lights out and do battle with the unseen forces.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Playing for Keeps

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Arks
programme.desc: Cut off from continents, remote islands have become floating arks, attracting migrating species and forging new ones. Take a privileged glimpse into the secret lives of the rare and exotic species that inhabit these lost worlds.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Rivers
programme.desc: Rivers flow freely - beautiful and powerful waterways that underscore the melody of life. As they meander through the landscape, they shape it, wearing down ranges and deepening valleys, eventually flowing out into the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the worlds most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: Arthur: Muffy's Classy Classics Club/Best Enemies
programme.desc: Muffy buys all of the books and dolls in the Pretty Pioneers series and invites her friends to join a pretty book club. Mom has new clients coming over and they have a daughter who is D.W.'s age. They're going to be the best of friends!

programme.title: Arthur: Just Desserts/The Big Dig
programme.desc: Arthur has a hard time resisting sweets, and one evening his overindulgence wins him an upset stomach and some 'Grimm' dreams. Arthur and D.W. loved it when Grandpa Dave came to visit--but now he only wants to sleep and play checkers.

programme.title: Arthur: Vomitrocious!/Sue Ellen Chickens Out
programme.desc: It's just a regular day until Francine starts to feel queasy, and then throws up in the cafeteria! Now Francine is afraid to go back to school. And, Sue Ellen learns that a fast-food chain is taking over the beloved Sugar Bowl.

programme.title: Arthur: The Director's Cut/Crime and Consequences
programme.desc: After meeting his hero, Hollywood director Tufton Sinclair, George is inspired to make a movie of his own. When George accidentally breaks the class's prize woodworking project, Binky gets unfairly blamed.

programme.title: Arthur: Blabbermouth/All Grown Up
programme.desc: Buster is hurt when he learns his friends don't trust him to keep a secret. Then, the gang finds a mysterious fortune telling game at the library and gets a hint of what their futures could hold.

programme.title: Arthur: Fountain Abbey/Arthur Calls It
programme.desc: Muffy's devastated when she learns her great, great grandmother Mary Alice wasn't royalty, but a common maid. Pressure from his classmates has Arthur doubting his decision to call Buster out during a baseball game.

programme.title: Arthur: Desert Island Dish/The Secret About Secrets
programme.desc: When Mr. Ratburn challenges the class to find the perfect food for surviving on a desert island, everyone picks potato chips or ice cream! D.W. is told a secret and quickly learns that keeping one is a lot harder than she thought.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Moves In/The Perfect Brother
programme.desc: A new girl has arrived in town and no one knows anything about her. And judging by the strange things happening at her house no one wants to know. Then, it's great having a friend spend the weekend.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur vs. The Piano/The Big Blow-Up
programme.desc: Arthur gets stage fright during a rehearsal. Will he be able to get through his recital without any mistakes? Then, two opinionated friends butt heads! Can Francine and The Brain put aside their differences for the good of the soccer team?

programme.title: Secret War: Christine Granville
programme.desc: Christine Granville, aka Krystyna Skarbek, a brave SOE agent, secured the release of captured comrades from the Gestapo before Operation Dragoon, earning the George Medal.

programme.title: Secret War: The French Triple Agent
programme.desc: Operation Cockade, led by MI6's double agent Henri Dericourt in 1943, aimed to deceive Germans with sabotage. Despite efforts, Germans withdrew divisions unconvinced. Dericourt faced a post-war treason trial and died in a mysterious 1962 plane crash.

programme.title: Secret War: The Spymistress and the French Fiasco
programme.desc: After WWII, SOE disbanded, leaving Vera Atkins to uncover fates of 118 agents, including 13 women. Many were betrayed and sent to camps; some were executed. Atkins' quest continued, marked by personal impact and delayed recognition.

programme.title: Secret War: The SAS Italian Job
programme.desc: In 1945, during the Italian Spring offensive, SOE agent Michael Lees and SAS officer Roy Farran led a raid on German HQs at Villa Rossi and Villa Calvi. Despite orders to cancel, Farran attacked with SAS men and partisans, killing many Germans.

programme.title: Secret War: The Dutch Disaster
programme.desc: Operation North Pole was a WWII German deception using captured SOE agents to mislead Britain. 47 of 50 agents were captured. Despite warnings, SOE ignored signs of compromise to maintain support, leading to a major intelligence failure.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jesse & Brian
programme.desc: Jesse met Brian online. They made plans to meet, but Brian stood her up. Now, years later, Brian has asked her to live with him. But, she can't stop wondering - what is Brian hiding? (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: While Prophet, of Grammy-nominated Nappy Roots, is making his rap career comeback, he connected online with Trinity. Prophet's ready to settle down, but is this beauty too good to be true?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Steven & Samm
programme.desc: Steven is due to graduate high school, instead of planning for college he wants to move to California for his online love, Samm. Steven's mom is sceptical of Samm's identity.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kya & Alyx
programme.desc: In this episode we meet Kya and Alyx, who fell in love quickly after meeting online. Are they being honest with each other? Hosts Nev Schulman and Max Joseph investigate. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Brittany finds love online with Bryon, a marine who may get deployed again to Iraq, she seeks Nev and Max's help before she runs out of time to discover if the perfect military man is real.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Bianca & Brogan
programme.desc: When Brogan disappears from the Internet, then returns online after a year without question, Bianca wants to know what happened in the missing year.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: A Sea Of Tears
programme.desc: The villa reaches breaking point with the arrival of not one but three Exes, causing chaos for lovebirds Ross and Harriette. Meanwhile Zahida's Ex, Joe, spirals out of control.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Harriette's Love Triangle
programme.desc: The misery continues for the singles as Sean moves from Zahida to Zaralena, and Harriette's love triangle deepens. Maisie's desperate for action and a Geordie makes a spectacular entrance.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Nicole's Nightmare
programme.desc: The tension in the villa reaches boiling point as Zaralena feels the force of Zahida's rage. Josh has his eye on Nicole, but will it be game over when she discovers a devastating secret?

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: The Blonde Bombshell
programme.desc: Adam reveals his feelings for Nicole, while Jack and Josh hope for fresh blood in the villa. Zaralena grows closer to Aaron, and Ross and Harriette finally spend a night in the penthouse.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 122
programme.desc: Melita must tell Marcus how she feels before he leaves for the military. Gaming nerd Brian, tells Samantha that he's in love with her.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 101
programme.desc: Connor is in love with his best friend Brittanie and must try to convince her that he should be more than her "shopping partner." Gabby reveals her feelings to her best friend Nick.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 102
programme.desc: Heather must convince her best friend Gary that she's more than "one of the guys", while Kevin tries to prove to Janine that nice guys finish first.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 103
programme.desc: Peter's best friend, Victoria is going off to college and he MUST confess his feelings before she leaves. Christie, a hockey player with Olympic aspirations, must get out of the Friendzone with her best friend Dylan.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Playing With Fire
programme.desc: In September 2002, two men were found executed in a burning Mercedes in an upscale Hollywood neighborhood. What initially looked like a drug-related murder, turned out to be something entirely different, but the crime scene left little evidence to go on.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Scared to Death
programme.desc: Police Lt. Jim Barton found his wife, Vickie, murdered execution-style on their farm in Warren County, Ohio, in 1995. With limited physical evidence and no suspects, the investigation lay dormant for nine years until a tip opened the case.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Exposed
programme.desc: A report about serial killer Bill Bradford, who posed as an amateur photographer and told women hed make them famous. Convicted of two murders, Bradford has been on death row since 1988.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 1
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 2
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Over the Edge
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2009 disappearance of Dawn Viens, and why her husband, California chef David Viens, jumped off a cliff when he became a suspect in her disappearance.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield is bitten by the video game bug. Orson dreams hes double-Oh Orson again.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: D.J Jon/Cornfinger/Five Minute Warning
programme.desc: Jon becomes a D.J./The super fpy, Double-O-Orson returns./Jon bets Garfield that he can't go five minutes without eating.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Dr. Bean tries again to use Odie as the basis for robot dogs. Orson dreams hes Power Pig.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Wonderful World/Orson Awards/Garfield Workout
programme.desc: Jon, Garfield and Odie head to the Wonder World amusement park./Roy and Orson's brothers scheme to get the big award./Garfield shows some of his favorite exercises.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Ship Shape/Barn of Fear 2/Break a Leg
programme.desc: Jon goes on a cruise./The ancestors of the U.S. Acres assist in foil-ing Orson's greedy brothers./Garfield and Odie tag along as Jon heads to a ski lodge.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Sludge Monster/Fortune Kooky/Heatwave Holiday
programme.desc: Jon, Garfield and Odie spend the night in a spooky hotel./Orson tries to convince Wade that fortune cookies aren't accurate./On a hot summer day, Garfield brings out the Christmas decorations.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Curse of Klopman/Mud Sweet Mud/Rainy Day Dreams
programme.desc: Garfield inherits the cursed diamond./The farm folk decide to clean up the place, Orson's waller becomes a prime objective./While Jon hosts a lady friend on a rainy day.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: China Cat/Cock-A-Doodle Dandy/Beach Blanket Bonzo
programme.desc: Jon and Garfield hear the story of the dragon and the cat./Roy's Morning bugle keeps waking up an angry bear./Garfield's attempt at a beach romance are hindered.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Fit for a King/Ben Hog/Dessert in the Desert
programme.desc: Garfield tells the story of a King who is given his weight in gold every year./Orson dreams he's in Ben Hog's chariot race./Jon's car breaks down in the desert.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Mystic Manor/Flop Goes the Weasel/The Legend of Long Jon
programme.desc: Garfield discovers a famous "haunted house" attraction is closed./Wade inadvertently defeats a local weasel./Jon discovers he is related to a traitor of George Washington.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Double Dead
programme.desc: Gangsters running a loan-shark racket in Hawaii short-circuit the IMF team's investigation when they capture Willy and feed him gigantic doses of truth serum.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Casino
programme.desc: Guest star Jack Cassidy is Orin Kerr, an ex-hoodlum who now controls the largest gambling resort in the western hemisphere as a front for the underworld crime syndicate.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Trapped
programme.desc: Jim Phelps is struck on the head and loses his memory while trying to intercept an eight-million-dollar smuggling operation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Break!
programme.desc: Carl Betz, Barbara Anderson, and Robert Conrad guest star alongside Jim Phelps who, with the aid of Barney's electronic wizardry, takes on the guise of a hot-shot pool hustler to break up an illegal gambling operation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Two Thousand
programme.desc: Joe Collins is a nuclear scientist who is made to believe that he is a prisoner in the year 2000 and is about to be executed as part of the IMF's plans to learn where he has hidden enough plutonium to construct a dozen atomic bombs.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Who's Your Neighbor?
programme.desc: Through pretend play, Barney and the children learn about their community and the people that help them live safely and happily there.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Riffs Musical Zoo - Boats
programme.desc: Everyone is excited about an upcoming trip to the zoo. When the trip is postponed, Riff decides to create a musical zoo. He gathers instruments that sound like real animals. Everyone has a wonderful time at Riff's musical zoo.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When several sports balls suddenly disappear without a trace, its detective BJ to the rescue as he dons trenchcoat and fedora.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop meets a new girl named Jill who doesnt want to join the fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ learns a lesson about bragging when, playing superhero CAPTAIN PICKLES, he tells everyone that he can leap over the moon!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Let's Make Music
programme.desc: Barney, Baby Bop and BJ have fun learning about music, rhythm and musical instruments. Barney introduces many different instruments and BJ dreams of one day becoming a rock 'n roll star. They discover that music gives everyone a happy feelin.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Stop! Go!
programme.desc: After playing with "Stop" and "Go" signs with Angela, Baby Bop leaves to direct some traffic of her own! Meanwhile, in the caboose, Barney and the kids enjoy a costume parade, a game of "Musical Stop & Go," and some very vigorous body movement.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Picture of Friendship
programme.desc: After a brief misunderstanding, BJ realizes he has many friends. He enjoys a day playing with Barney and the children.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Gone in 20 Seconds
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get taken down by their fiercest opponent, CJ, but a twist of fate keeps the guys in the game. They uncover a Geiger counter and NASCAR impact wrenches, while their accountant delivers some shocking news.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Ton-Geons & Dragons
programme.desc: While Ton soups up their new truck, Allen heads to an auction solo and encounters Carolyn and CJ. There he discovers LARP weaponry, a sword collection, and falconry gear, before Ton reveals their new ride: Betty.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to a Hollywood auction and face a new competitor with a seemingly endless cash flow. After they uncover a triple barrel shotgun and an antique camel saddle, Allen confronts an old childhood fear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Party Gras
programme.desc: On a trip to New Orleans, Ton and Allen look to mix business with pleasure. They wage war with some locals at a tough auction, win a Mardi Gras unit that contains a confetti blaster and a modern calliope, then hit the town.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Allen vs. Ton
programme.desc: When Ton and Allen find themselves bidding against each other at an auction, the former partners battle it out in an epic showdown that leaves the fate of the pawnshop and their friendship in question.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Cashville, Tennessee
programme.desc: Ton and Allen hit the road for Nashville, where they rumble with a band of tough, high-bidding bikers. The day explodes when the guys discover a 37 millimeter anti-tank gun and a cowboy's rodeo saddle.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Separation Anxiety
programme.desc: With Ton missing, Allen struggles to keep the pawn shop afloat while training Elle to work an auction. After a fierce bidding war with Caroline, pieces from a century old motorcycle may not be enough to save the day. ed.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Once a Pawn a Time
programme.desc: Ton and Allen discover that owning a pawn shop is way more trouble than they expected. With bills stacking up, even an antique ammo collection and some classic football helmets may not be enough to put the guys in the black.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Ton Voyage
programme.desc: When a ruthless storeowner seems hell-bent on stopping Ton & Allen from scoring new items in Santa Barbara they fight back. The guys uncover a rare antique air-gun and a vintage wooden boat built for speed, if it floats!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Carnies & Armories

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: In Search of SK1 - Akira Ojima Case

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Honeymoon Killers (Van Beers Case)

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Two Accused of Murder (Jennifer Charron Case)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: A fierce storm is forecast for Bobsville. At the farm Travis stays safe and snug in his shed, while Spud takes cover in a large barn. The storm causes a lot of damage and a tree falls on Spuds barn hes okay, but his nose is a bit squashed!

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to save his own life, Ashlocke revives an ancient Egyptian alchemist who poses a lethal threat to the Mutant X team.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team struggles to disempower a military colonel who has threatened to unleash a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke goes back in time to try and make himself invincible by giving something to his the younger self, prompting Brennan and Shalimar to follow him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Phantom Companion
programme.desc: While on board the mothership, Renee sustains an injury and while being treated, she gets pulled into the walls and disappears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dream Stalker
programme.desc: Street asks Liam to help a friend who's arrested for the murder of a man he hated. Liam talks to him and he claims that he dreamed of killing him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Lost Generation
programme.desc: A CVI malfunctions and kills a soon-to-be father. The investigation leads Liam and Renee to a fertility clinic. Renee finds out she is infertile and suspects that Taelon technology is affecting worldwide fertility.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Summit
programme.desc: Da'an leaves and doesn't being Liam along. Zo'or is frantic as to why Da'an left. Liam wants to help but Zo'or doesn't trust him because he doesn't have a CVI, so Liam agrees to be implanted.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Matter
programme.desc: When the mother ship hits dark matter, the ship dos not begin to heal itself. Zo'or is left in an unconscious state and Sandoval takes control. He decides it is time to liberate the Earth from the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keys to the Kingdom
programme.desc: The relic left by Ma'el is stolen from the mother ship. Zo'or threatens to destroy a major city if it isn't returned. Liam believes the final chapters contain information on synthesizing core energy.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Street Chase
programme.desc: Sandoval is watching via nanobots inside Street as she tries to decipher Ma'el's riddle. She tries to figure out how to escape from Sandoval and the Taelons forcing her to solve the riddle. She flashes back to childhood fears.

programme.title: The Lost World: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: A dying stranger issues a warning to three of the explorers, begging them to find a hunter named Pierson Rice. Roxton shares a common, painful past with the mysterious Rice.

programme.title: The Lost World: Dead Man's Hill
programme.desc: Roxton stumbles into a bizarre Wild West alternate reality when he finds his name on a tombstone. Roxton meets the other explorers' pioneer-town personas.

programme.title: The Lost World: Hollow Victory
programme.desc: Challenger experiments with a new fuel source in the hot-air balloon, and takes the other explorers along for a test ride. However, a storm drags the balloon into a dangerous underground world.

programme.title: The Lost World: A Witch's Calling
programme.desc: While Roxton and Malone search for the missing Veronica, two young witches lure them away from safety. Unbeknownst to the explorers, a sorceress and her disciples plot to destroy Challenger.

programme.title: The Lost World: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: Malone is pierced by a poison dart from a Keeran blowdart. Under the influence of the hallucinogenic poison, Malone relives his nightmarish experience as a battlefield correspondent in WWI.

programme.title: The Lost World: Ice Age
programme.desc: A new Ice Age threatens the ecosystem. The explorers investigate the site of a meteor crash and try to help a woman. Not knowing who she is, they are targeted by her cold-blooded subjects.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's day two for Charlie Ross and Catherine Southon as they cosy up on their rain-swept journey criss-crossing southern England in the hunt for antiques to sell at an auction in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Day three of their jaunt finds Catherine Southon and Charlie Ross wending their way along the south coast, headed for a shock at the auction in Lewes.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: As Charlie Ross and Catherine Southon battle it out on day four, they take in some history on their trip from the south coast of England to London.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the final showdown for Charlie Ross and Catherine Southon as they embark on their last journey in the classic car, heading for auction in Rye.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the start of a brand-new series as Thomas Plant and Philip Serrell team up for a 700-mile trip beginning in Lancashire and the Isle of Man.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Philip Serrell thinks "big is best" on his shopping trip with rival expert Thomas Plant as they journey from York to Rotherham in search of a bargain.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Fallon Sherrock and Ted Evetts join Chris Murphy on Tungsten Talk to discuss their World Championship clash.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Paul Hinks joins Chris Murphy on Tungsten Talk to delve into memorable moments on the darts circuit.

programme.title: Justin Smith Vs The Bullseye Challenge
programme.desc: Featuring Martin Adams, Andy Hamilton and more!

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Simon Whitlock joins Paul Nicholson on Tungsten Talk to delve into memorable moments on the darts circuit.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Henry Deacon and Paul Nicholson discuss the rise in prize money across PDC darts from 2026.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Mervyn King joins Henry Deacon on Tungsten Talk to reflect on his darts career so far.

programme.title: The Story of Damon Heta
programme.desc: Henry Deacon and Scott Mitchell reflect on the story of Damon Heta, discussing his career and achievements.

programme.title: The Story of Max Hopp
programme.desc: Chris Murphy and Henry Deacon discuss Max Hopp's trailblazing darts career.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: ADC Global Champion Devon Petersen joins Tungsten Talk to discuss his trailblazing career.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Stand By Your Man
programme.desc: Season finale. Chloe and Jordan throw their first party, Mia and Amber make a fresh start, Megan suspects Dylan is hiding something and Sassi goes all out to win back her man! (S3, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: End Of An Era
programme.desc: Emotions run high for Amber, Chloe has a Mother's Day from hell, Sassi and Darren try and repair their relationship while Dylan's friendship with another girl has tipped Megan over the edge. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Seeing Red
programme.desc: Sassi attends an anger management course. Ste hits a low point as he upsets both Amber and Kirsty. Shannon decides to rekindle an old romance and Chloe and Jordan welcome a new addition. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Sassi tries to stay calm on a romantic getaway. Amber gives Ste the cold shoulder. Sleep-deprived Chloe questions if getting a puppy was a good idea. Shannon resits her GCSEs. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: When a 17-year-old girl breaks up with her abusive boyfriend, he snaps and breaks into her bedroom to attack her.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Perfect Family
programme.desc: A young man is on trial for the murder of his mother.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Psychiatrist and the Selfie
programme.desc: The case against Jacob Nolan, who claims his cousin and psychiatrist, Dr. Pamela Buchbinder, brainwashed him into attempting to kill her former lover, fellow psychiatrist Dr. Michael Weiss.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Who Killed Jane?
programme.desc: Jane Neumann was found dead of a gunshot wound in the basement of her home in Hudson, Wisconsin. Jane's husband Jim originally told police Jane was murdered by an intruder and then later changed his story and said she committed suicide.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fateful Connection
programme.desc: A report on the investigation led by a determined detective to solve a 30-year-old cold case involving two young women who went missing in Florida, in 1982.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Web of Seduction
programme.desc: A report on problems which arise when children under the age of 17 receive unwanted sexual letters on the Internet, focusing on Lindsay, a 14-year-old suburban Florida girl who began receiving explicit love letters from a stranger in Greece.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Ben Horne's brother, Jerry, arrives in Twin Peaks; James and Donna decide to be together. Ben and Jerry travel to One Eyed Jacks and meet with it's madam, Blackie O'Reilly. Audrey leaves a clue for Cooper.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The next morning, Cooper meets with Audrey, who confesses to leaving him the note about One Eyed Jacks. Cooper tells Truman he can't remember who the killer was in his dream, but insists the dream is a code to solving the crime.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper questions Dr. Jacoby, who suspects Leo Johnson is the killer. Cooper's supervisor, Gordon Cole, calls in with Albert's report. Josie Packard spies on Ben Horne and Catherine Martell. Hawk tracks down the One Armed Man.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper and company have tea with the Log Lady. The Log Lady tells them there was a third man following after Leo and Jacques the night Laura died. At Jacques Renault's cabin Cooper, Hawk, and Truman find Waldo the bird.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a beautiful and popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper slowly learns that strange things are happening.
